name: Vergiss Berlin
description:
Vergiss Berlin, or Forget Berlin is a virtual exhibition born from contemplations about Berlin's less spoken history. 

Thousands of years ago, the area which now is a bustling city used to be a large swamp land ruled by nature. The early human inhabitants built houses and bridges over the swamps and sang songs when sailing through the wetlands. 

What remains of the stories and melodies shared between all inhabitants of this ancient, nearly lost swamp? Perhaps the plants of modern day Berlin can wisper the old tales to our ears if we listen closely.
